description:
Ryuryuken decides to put out a booth at the neighborhood festival. The three brothers are told that whoever gets the most sales at the event, will get the opportunity to work at the store. However, they realize they are completely surrounded by South Star booths...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Money Never Dies! South Star is the Enemy! \ Don`t Sleep!! The Convenience Store Without a Headstone!
Zeni wa Horobinu! Minamito wa Teki Dahhya! / Nemuruna!! Bohyou Naki Konbini de!!
ゼニは滅びぬ! 南斗は敵だっひゃー! / 眠るな!!墓標なきコンビニで!!
